---
id: GetBatch订单s
title: Get Batch 订单s
sidebar_label: Get Batch 订单s
sidebar_position: 4
---

**类型:** GET

**描述:** `/spot/v4/batch-order`

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值值值值 | 描述 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| orderIds | 字符串 | 是 |  | 订单 IDs, e.g. `6216559590087220004, 6216559590087220005` |  |

### 注意事项

Response field information is the same as **Get Single 订单**.

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": [
    {
      "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
      "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
      "client订单Id": "16559590087220001",
      "base货币": "字符串",
      "quote货币": "字符串",
      "side": "BUY",
      "type": "LIMIT",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "price": "40000",
      "origQty": "2",
      "origQuoteQty": "48000",
      "executedQty": "1.2",
      "leavingQty": "字符串",
      "tradeBase": "2",
      "tradeQuote": "48000",
      "avgPrice": "42350",
      "fee": "字符串",
      "fee货币": "字符串",
      "state": "NEW",
      "time": 1655958915583,
      "updatedTime": 1655958915583
    }
  ]
}
```
